passiveSkills.name: Flight Master
passiveSkills.desc: Increases Attack while jumping or in flight.

advancedSkills.name: Fighting Blade
advancedSkills.desc: Perform a combo using sword skills honed by kendo.

advancedSkills.name: Flying Gust
advancedSkills.desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

advancedSkills.name: Healing Wind
advancedSkills.desc: Grants automatic HP recovery to all party members for a period of time.

advancedSkills.name: Flying Gust
advancedSkills.desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

advancedSkills.name: Flying Gust
advancedSkills.desc: Slash upward and leap into the air. After the slash, recover some of your flight gauge and remain hovering. Deals Wind damage.

advancedSkills.name: Tyrant's Hurricane
advancedSkills.desc: Unleash a massive tornado in the targeted area, damaging and pulling in surrounding enemies. Deals Wind Damage.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. An input after a Normal Attack combo will branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Gale Sweep, a dash into a rising slash.

advancedSkills.name: Heavy Attack
advancedSkills.desc: Stronger than a Normal Attack. An input after a Normal Attack combo will branch into a Combo Finish. Hold the button for Gale Sweep, a dash into a rising slash.
